title: M347 Mathematical Statistics
text:
context
M347 is a third level Maths and Statistics model, taking a deep dive into the mathematics behind key statistical ideas as diverse as the Central Limit Theorem, MCMC and generalized linear models.

    
    
  



tutorials
Added through the academic year


apps

title: M348 Applied Statistical Modelling
text:
context
M348 is a third level Maths and Statistics model, using R and Jupyter notebooks, with three sections:

linear models
generalized linear models
A: Econometrics or B: Data Science


    
    
  



tutorials
Added through the academic year


apps

title: M249 Practical Modern Statistics
text:
M249 is a second level Maths and Statistics model, with four sections:

medical statistics
time series
multivariate analysis
Bayesian statistics

title: M249 Practical Modern Statistics
text:
